1_1.title: 🌞 1 | 1 – Born Leader. Soul Leader.
1_1.intro: When the Sun rules both your birth & destiny, you're not just meant to shine — you're meant to lead.
body: You walk into rooms with silent authority.
You don’t follow paths — you create them.
1_1.closing: ☀️ You’re not here to blend in. You’re here to stand out.

1_2.title: 🌞 1 | 2 – Leader with a Heart.
1_2.intro: You’re bold like the Sun, but guided by deep emotional wisdom.
body: You lead with intuition and connect with empathy.
People follow you because they feel seen.
1_2.closing: ❤️ You lead minds, but you touch hearts.

1_3.title: 🌞 1 | 3 – The Radiant Communicator.
1_3.intro: A leader with words, charm, and spark.
body: You inspire not just by action but by expression.
You’re here to speak, create, and shine.
1_3.closing: 🎤 Your voice is your power — use it to light up the world.

1_4.title: 🌞 1 | 4 – The Builder King/Queen.
1_4.intro: Your dreams aren't just dreams — they become structures.
body: You’re a visionary who follows through.
Discipline + vision = legacy.
1_4.closing: 🏗️ You don’t just lead — you build what lasts.

1_5.title: 🌞 1 | 5 – The Wild Innovator.
body: You’re the leader who can’t be caged.
Rules are just starting points for your next idea.
1_5.closing: ⚡ You lead with energy. Keep it flowing, not burning out.

1_6.title: 🌞 1 | 6 – The Guiding Light.
1_6.intro: You lead with a sense of responsibility and love.
body: Family, community, values — all sit close to your heart.
You bring order, beauty, and care.
1_6.closing: 💖 Your strength is soft — and that’s what makes it powerful.

1_7.title: 🌞 1 | 7 – The Mystic Leader.
1_7.intro: A thinker. A loner. A seeker of truth.
body: You lead from within, with depth and insight.
Your power lies in clarity, not chaos.
1_7.closing: 🔮 Lead in silence. Your inner knowing speaks louder than words.

1_8.title: 🌞 1 | 8 – The Power Player.
body: You’re here to create wealth, status, and influence — but with purpose.
You're built for the big stage.
1_8.closing: 💼 Power isn't a goal — it's your tool for greater impact.

1_9.title: 🌞 1 | 9 – The Visionary Flame.
1_9.intro: You're a leader for the world, not just for self.
body: Your power shines through compassion, art, and service.
You're meant to inspire hearts and uplift humanity.
1_9.closing: 🌍 Your mission is bigger than you — and that's your magic.

2_1.title: 🌙 2 | 1 – The Gentle Leader.
2_1.intro: You blend Moon’s softness with the Sun’s commanding power.
body: You lead with compassion, but your presence still commands respect.
People trust you because you listen before you act.
2_1.closing: 🌗 Your calm, kind energy makes you unforgettable.

2_2.title: 🌙 2 | 2 – The Soul Connector.
2_2.intro: When Moon meets Moon, emotions run deep and empathy overflows.
body: You understand the unspoken feelings of others.
You create harmony wherever you go.
2_2.closing: 💧 Your emotions are a gift — use them wisely.

2_3.title: 🌙 2 | 3 – The Heartfelt Artist.
2_3.intro: You express deep feelings with creativity and charm.
body: Your sensitivity turns into art and self-expression.
Your words, voice, or smile leave a lasting impact.
2_3.closing: 🎨 You paint with emotion — let your heart guide your art.

2_4.title: 🌙 2 | 4 – The Peaceful Planner.
2_4.intro: Your emotional intelligence meets grounded discipline.
body: You bring calm into chaos and structure into feelings.
People rely on your balanced approach.

2_5.title: 🌙 2 | 5 – The Empath Explorer.

body: You mix emotional depth with curiosity.
People feel safe opening up to your free-spirited energy.

2_5.closing: 🌬️ You flow like the wind — free but deeply connected.

2_6.closing: 🌸 You’re here to love — but love yourself first.

2_7.title: 🌙 2 | 7 – The Intuitive Thinker.
2_7.intro: You merge emotion with deep inner wisdom.
body: You sense things others miss.
Your intuition is your superpower.
2_7.closing: 🔮 Trust your inner voice — it never lies.

2_8.title: 🌙 2 | 8 – The Compassionate Power.

body: You care deeply and act strategically.

2_8.closing: ⚖️ Your kindness is your power — never doubt it.

2_9.title: 🌙 2 | 9 – The Soulful Giver.
2_9.intro: You feel for the world — and often carry its weight.
body: Your empathy expands beyond individuals.
You’re here to uplift, heal, and serve.
2_9.closing: 🌊 You are the ocean of empathy — flow, don’t drown.
